jobDescription: Our client is looking for a Data Analyst for a contract to hire position here in Austin, TX. You will be joining a team that provides critical information to internal and external stakeholders. What you will be doing: Extract, manipulate, and analyze client data for internal and external use.  Receive, format, and import client data to our custom-built database application.  Coordinate with project management to execute and prioritize workflow.  Handle data transfer with outside agencies What you bring to the table: Have extensive Excel and relational database experience  Handle large amounts of data efficiently and effectively  Experience working in a collaborative environment to identify problems and create innovative solutions.  Experience with pivot tables is a big plus.  This is a fulltime position in Austin, TX. Luna Data Solutions is an equal opportunity employer. To apply, please email your resume to ******************************
